name: Soilink Organic
overview:
The two most important things required for successful vermicomposting method is burning desire and space.

Organic Waste Cycle: If the important link is missing, we will only be taking things away from the mother earth. One day there will be dearth of resources. Hence it is paramount to maintain a practice everything natural, send back to nature.

We offer organic waste utilization systems based on the

  1. Dwelling places
  2. Type of load
  3. Space availability

Dwelling spaces are broadly of four types: Own house/Banglow Apartment complex Chawl Hutments

We also offer system for septic tanks and soak pits, where the vermicomposting eliminates the need of taking out sludge. The sludge is cracked inside the tank/pit and the nutrients are absorbed in the soil. Water can be pumped out or if the tank is at higher level, water can be released from the upper side of the tank to garden for growing Bottle Guard, banana and ‘Arvi’. Please contact us for more information.

Organic Waste Cycle: If the important link is missing, we will only be taking things away from the mother earth. One day there will be dearth of resources. Hence it is paramount to maintain a practice everything natural, send back to nature.
